faq_items.q: How accurate are your astrological calculations?
faq_items.a: We use Swiss Ephemeris — the most accurate astronomical data recognized by professional astrologers worldwide. Accuracy is our top priority.

faq_items.q: How are AI interpretations better than regular ones?
faq_items.a: Unlike generic horoscopes, our AI creates a unique interpretation based on all of your chart's data: the positions of planets, houses, and the aspects between them. This is a deeply personalized analysis.
Yes. We take privacy seriously. Your data is used exclusively for calculations within the app and is never shared with third parties.
